job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to generate and evaluate code, rather than building, training, or deploying AI models. It emphasizes human feedback and interaction with AI models as a user, which aligns more with using AI tools for productivity rather than engineering them.

phrases: helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code
Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the process of training and evaluating AI models, specifically large language models and generative AI, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.

The description asks for experienced software engineers and mentions lending coding expertise, implying a need for software development skills, though the primary focus is on using these skills to interact with and train AI models.

phrases: no requirement for previous AI experience
soft_skills.justification: This phrase suggests that the role is open to individuals without prior AI experience, implying a need for adaptability and a willingness to learn new concepts and tools related to AI.
The freelance and flexible hours nature of the role suggests a need for self-direction, initiative, and ownership of one's work, aligning with the 'Innovation & Ownership' soft skill.
